citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1205 on
16-APR-19.
The inspector knocked on front door several times, called both numbers and left messages on both.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

16-APR-19.
The inspector knocked on front door several times, called both numbers and left messages on both.
